name: Animal Trucks in Christmas
description:
FREE for a LIMITED TIME!

► ► ► ► ►

GET BEHIND the WHEEL… PICK UP your PAYLOAD…
DIP and DIVE, BOUNCE and FLY, then DELIVER in this PHYSICS ADVENTURE!

► ► ► ► ►

you are a busy truck driver. every day, it's up to you to deliver important payloads to their various destinations.

are you up to the job?

► ► ► ► ►

• awesome physics, with bouncing, crashing, flying, exploding and more!
• intuitive tap & tilt controls

► ► ► ► ►
